content: free pattern copyright © federica gatto all rights reserved www makeitmagical it /makeitmagical4ever @make_it_magical snowflake couple beanie #1 materials - 1 everest roses filati 75% wool - 25% acrylic 100 g / 100 m color 4 blue color a - 1 everest roses filati 75% wool - 25% acrylic 100 g / 100 m color 1 white color b - needles 6 mm circular needles or equivalent for have the gauge 16 stitches for 15 row 10x10 cm - stitch marker - pom pom maker or faux pom pom abbreviations and stitch use a stitch marker to help you keep track of your rounds begin and end k knit p purl when knitting the contrast color knit loosely to prevent the stitches from being pulled too tight when stretched knitting with two color https //www youtube com/watch v =ulnk9xhoxuy sewing back stitch my favorite tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v =ja_ykbdm_o4 beginning of the beanie this beanie is knitted in the round starting with the ribbing alternating knit and purl stitches the body is worked in stockinette knit stitches in the round for adult size with color a cast on 60 stitches you should always have a multiple of 20 stitches place stitches marker join to knit in the round being careful not to twist round 1-9 *k1 p1* repeat * to * around round 10-12 k all stitches copyright © federica gatto all rights reserved www makeitmagical it /makeitmagical4ever @make_it_magical you may
